德克萨斯州和佛罗里达州的立法者如何破坏新冠疫苗接种工作凯瑟琳·威尔斯 (Katherine Wells) 希望敦促她位于德克萨斯州拉伯克的社区接种 covid-19 疫苗。 “这确实可以使人们免于患上严重疾病，”该市公共卫生主任威尔斯说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-lawmakers-in-Texas-and-Florida-undermine-covid-vaccination-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/How-lawmakers-in-Texas-and-Florida-undermine-covid-vaccination-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b382a80-6871-4ac6-bb86-a844ed057141 Mon, 13 Nov 2023 06:26:56 -0500 How lawmakers in Texas and Florida undermine covid vaccination efforts

SELECT 试验：索马鲁肽可将非糖尿病超重或肥胖患者的心血管事件减少 20%克利夫兰诊所医生报告的一项多中心国际临床试验结果显示，对于超重或肥胖且已患有心血管疾病但未患有糖尿病的成年人，索马鲁肽可将心血管事件减少 20%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/SELECT-Trial-Semaglutide-reduces-cardioangio-events-by-2025-in-overweight-or-obese-病人-without-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/SELECT-Trial-Semaglutide-reduces-cardioangio-events-by-2025-in-overweight-or-obese-患者-without-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=974b197f-c4bf-419d-9e7e-29ed41852ccc Mon, 13 Nov 2023 05:51:18 -0500 SELECT trial: Semaglutide reduces cardiovascular events by 20% in overweight or obese patients without diabetes
